explanation: [0-0] A man with an exaggerated facial expression, wearing a hat, is lying in bed with his eyes closed. He is wearing a red hoodie. Above him, there is a yellow subtitle with black text: "OFFICIAL CHANNEL@mercuri 88 Android Family". On the left, there is a white subtitle: "Tik Tok @mercuri 88", and above the subtitle, there is a "Tik Tok" logo.
[0-2] The man suddenly opens his eyes wide. He takes the blanket off himself and quickly gets out of bed, looking to the left. The scene changes to a man dancing in a doorway.

[2-5] Then, the scene changes to a room where a person is facing away from the camera with long blonde hair. He turns around to face the camera, wearing a blonde wig and holding an orange cup, smiling. The scene changes to the man in the red hoodie, squatting at the doorway, holding an orange cup, and smiling.

[5-10] Subsequently, the scene changes to a man with an exaggerated facial expression wearing a hat, sleeping in bed. The man suddenly wakes up and looks up, then quickly gets out of bed and looks to the left. The scene changes to a man wearing a blonde wig and a dressing gown, sliding from one side of the room to the other with his arms outstretched. Then the shot changes to the man in the red hoodie sitting on the bed, being knocked over by the man in the blonde wig.
